Bitstamp Connect simplifies crypto taxation with Kryptos integration
Bitstamp has partnered with Kryptos – a cryptocurrency tax calculation platform – to simplify the crypto portfolio tracking and tax calculations for Bitstamp customers in 15 countries

We’re helping simplify the crypto tax process for our customers in the UK, Czech Republic, Poland, Norway, Netherlands, Romania, Germany, Finland, Sweden, Portugal, Spain, Italy, Denmark, the USA, and Australia.

Automating crypto portfolio tracking and tax reports

We’ve partnered with Kryptos, a pioneering platform in Web3 finance, to enhance your experience and financial management capabilities. If you’re a Bitstamp customer from one of the countries above, you can now use this platform, via Bitstamp Connect, to:

  • Track your crypto portfolio
  • Calculate your crypto taxes
  • Import crypto transactions from over 5,000+ Web3 integrations

With the Kryptos platform, you can easily set up tax reports based on various actions across DeFi, centralized and decentralized exchanges, and multiple blockchains. Kryptos supports real-time crypto asset balance tracking, liabilities, P&L calculations, and transaction classification. This ensures that your portfolio is managed efficiently, and your tax reports are compliant with local laws and regulations. Altogether, it can simplify your Web3 financial management.

How to start?

To start with automated tax reporting with Kryptos, follow these steps:

  • Sign up at https://app.kryptos.io/signup.
  • Select your country after signing up.
  • Choose Bitstamp as your preferred exchange platform.
  • Connect to Bitstamp using Bitstamp Connect.

So, are you ready to calculate your crypto taxes in minutes? Get started with Kryptos.
